Builder #page
Indian River Club is a beautiful private Golf Club Community located on the Florida Ridge and less than a mile from the spectacular Indian River Lagoon. A Club Membership includes spouse or significant other and children under 22 years of age residing with the Primary Member.
Full Membership
Full use of Golf Course and Practice Facilities
Unlimited rounds of golf
Full access to the Clubhouse, Social and Golf Tournament Calendar, Dining Facility, Swim Centers, Fitness Center and Pickleball Courts
Golf tee time reservations may be made 7-10 days in advance
Golf Club Bag Storage
Preferred Member pricing in the Golf Shop
Access to available Summer Golf Reciprocal Program
Young Executive
Ages 49 and under
Full use of Golf Course and Practice Facilities
Unlimited rounds of golf
Full access to the Clubhouse, Social and Golf Tournament Calendar, Dining Facility, Swim Centers, Fitness Center and Pickleball Courts
Golf tee time reservations may be made 7 days in advance
Golf Club Bag Storage
Preferred Member pricing in the Golf Shop
Access to available Summer Golf Reciprocal Program
Social Membership
Full access to the Clubhouse, Social Calendar, Dining Facility, Swim Centers, Fitness Center and Pickleball Courts
Optional Range Plan available for use of the Practice Facility
Preferred Member pricing in the Golf Shop
The Social Member may play a limited number of rounds of golf (with the appropriate cart fees). Contact the Membership Director for details.
Access to available Summer Social Reciprocal Program
Contact Jonas DeWitte, Membership Director at (772) 770-0757 x106 or by filling out the form below.

Builder #page
Radio Controlled Sailing
The miniature vessels, expertly crafted and meticulously maintained, glide effortlessly across the water's surface. Members gather to sail and race radio-controlled sailboats in the lake on hole #8. Our Regatta at the end of the season is something to attend. Laughter and friendly banter fill the air as newcomers are warmly welcomed and seasoned sailors share tips and tricks.
Book Club, Bunco, Bridge, Poker & More
Indian River Club is the place to be for some card game action! From Bridge to Men's Poker Night, Cribbage to Bunco, the fun never stops. And let's not forget the classics like Mahjong and Canasta stealing the spotlight.
Oh, and don't miss out on our monthly Book Club gatherings - it's a pageturning delight!
Gun Club
The Gun Club originated as a casual Monday meet-up at the Vero Beach Sporting Clays Club. The buzz around the fun and thrill of the club quickly spread, resulting in a swift rise in its popularity among members. The newly built Sporting Club will be offering food and beverages in the near future. The group can participate in the sporting clubs tournaments and other events.
Audubon Tours
The Indian River Club was granted "Signature" status by Audubon International in 1995 for their dedication to environmental stewardship. Through bird expeditions, native plant prioritization, sustainability events, and maintaining an eco-friendly golf course, the club actively promotes conservation and education in the community. Members and visitors are encouraged to take part in educational tours that emphasize the significance of environmental conservation.
